Temporarily reduces your Dexterity die size by one.
contents.label: Slow

Temporarily reduces your Insight die size by one.

contents.rollMessage:
Rolling a ${!rolled_atr1}$ + ${!rolled_atr2}$ Check

${#dice1:= equalText(string(rolled_atr1) ,'DEX') == true ? ref('dex_current') : 0}$ ${#dice1:= equalText(string(rolled_atr1) ,'INS') == true and isZero(dice1) == true ? ref('ins_current') : dice1}$ ${#dice1:= equalText(string(rolled_atr1) ,'MIG') == true and isZero(dice1) == true ? ref('mig_current') : dice1}$ ${#dice1:= equalText(string(rolled_atr1) ,'WLP') == true and isZero(dice1) == true ? ref('wlp_current') : dice1}$ ${#dice2:= equalText(string(rolled_atr2) ,'DEX') == true ? ref('dex_current') : 0}$ ${#dice2:= equalText(string(rolled_atr2) ,'INS') == true and isZero(dice2) == true ? ref('ins_current') : dice2}$ ${#dice2:= equalText(string(rolled_atr2) ,'MIG') == true and isZero(dice2) == true ? ref('mig_current') : dice2}$ ${#dice2:= equalText(string(rolled_atr2) ,'WLP') == true and isZero(dice2) == true ? ref('wlp_current') : dice2}$

${!string(rolled_atr1)}$ = 1d${!dice1}$ = ${D1:=[1d:dice1:]}$

${!string(rolled_atr2)}$ = 1d${!dice2}$ = ${D2:=[1d:dice2:]}$

Result: ${D1+D2}$ HR: ${max(D1, D2)}$

${! largerEq(D1, 6) and D1 == D2 ? string('

CRITICAL SUCCESS! Gain an Opportunity

'): string('')}$ ${!D1 == D2 and D1 == 1 ? string('

FUMBLE

'): string('')}$

contents.rollMessage:
Effect FP Cost Description
Alter the Story 1 Alter an existing element or add a new element.
Invoke Bond 1 Add Bond strength to a Check
Invoke Trait 1 Reroll dice during a Check
Use Skill Varies Use a Skill that requires Fabula Points.

Initiative Roll

${#dice1:= ref('dex_current')}$ ${#dice2:= ref('ins_current')}$

DEX = 1d${!dice1}$ = ${D1:=[1d:dice1:]}$

INS = 1d${!dice2}$ = ${D2:=[1d:dice2:]}$

Result: ${!D1}$ + ${!D2}$ - ${abs(ref('init_penalty'))}$ = ${D1+D2+ref('init_penalty')}$

${! largerEq(D1, 6) and D1 == D2 ? string('

CRITICAL SUCCESS! Gain an Opportunity

'): string('')}$ ${!D1 == D2 and D1 == 1 ? string('

FUMBLE

'): string('')}$

contents.tooltip: 【WLP + WLP】 Produce a magical effect based on the Arcana you have bound.
contents.label: Arcanism

contents.tooltip: 【INS + WLP】 or 【MIG + WLP】 Enhance your senses, see through the eyes of an animal, quell the fury of a monster.
contents.label: Chimerism

contents.tooltip: 【INS + WLP】 Walk on water, shape rock, snuff out fires, cause a rainstorm or summon powerful cyclones.
contents.label: Elementalism

contents.tooltip: 【INS + WLP】 Cause the decay of physical matter, twist the flow of time, teleport creatures or items.
contents.label: Entropism

contents.tooltip: 【INS + WLP】 Extract magic from an object, activate a soul circuit, sense the presence of magic.
contents.label: Ritualism

contents.tooltip: 【INS + WLP】 Sense the presence and feelings of creatures, put someone to sleep or embolden their heart.
contents.label: Spiritism

contents.tooltip: Accesory
Armor
Light armor = additional defense; Martial Armor = Replaces defense score
Main hand
Shift-click to roll attack with HR treated as zero (for two-weapon fighting)
contents.rollMessage:
Attacking with ${!string((main_hand))}$!

${#dice1:= equalText(string(main_attrib_1) ,'DEX') == true ? ref('dex_current') : 0}$ ${#dice1:= equalText(string(main_attrib_1) ,'INS') == true and isZero(dice1) == true ? ref('ins_current') : dice1}$ ${#dice1:= equalText(string(main_attrib_1) ,'MIG') == true and isZero(dice1) == true ? ref('mig_current') : dice1}$ ${#dice1:= equalText(string(main_attrib_1) ,'WLP') == true and isZero(dice1) == true ? ref('wlp_current') : dice1}$ ${#dice2:= equalText(string(main_attrib_2) ,'DEX') == true ? ref('dex_current') : 0}$ ${#dice2:= equalText(string(main_attrib_2) ,'INS') == true and isZero(dice2) == true ? ref('ins_current') : dice2}$ ${#dice2:= equalText(string(main_attrib_2) ,'MIG') == true and isZero(dice2) == true ? ref('mig_current') : dice2}$ ${#dice2:= equalText(string(main_attrib_2) ,'WLP') == true and isZero(dice2) == true ? ref('wlp_current') : dice2}$${D1:=[1d:dice1:]}$, ${D2:=[1d:dice2:]}$${#HR:=max(D1, D2)}$

Attack Roll: ${D1+D2+ref('weapon1_mod')}$ ${! largerEq(D1, 6) and D1 == D2 ? string('CRITICAL SUCCESS! Gain an Opportunity'): string('')}$${!D1 == D2 and D1 == 1 ? string('FUMBLE'): string('')}$

The attack will deal ${HR+ref('weapon1_damage')}$ ${!string(ref('weapon1_damagetype'))}$ damage!
contents.altRollMessage:
Attacking with ${!string((main_hand))}$ using two-weapon fighting! 

${#dice1:= equalText(string(main_attrib_1) ,'DEX') == true ? ref('dex_current') : 0}$ ${#dice1:= equalText(string(main_attrib_1) ,'INS') == true and isZero(dice1) == true ? ref('ins_current') : dice1}$ ${#dice1:= equalText(string(main_attrib_1) ,'MIG') == true and isZero(dice1) == true ? ref('mig_current') : dice1}$ ${#dice1:= equalText(string(main_attrib_1) ,'WLP') == true and isZero(dice1) == true ? ref('wlp_current') : dice1}$ ${#dice2:= equalText(string(main_attrib_2) ,'DEX') == true ? ref('dex_current') : 0}$ ${#dice2:= equalText(string(main_attrib_2) ,'INS') == true and isZero(dice2) == true ? ref('ins_current') : dice2}$ ${#dice2:= equalText(string(main_attrib_2) ,'MIG') == true and isZero(dice2) == true ? ref('mig_current') : dice2}$ ${#dice2:= equalText(string(main_attrib_2) ,'WLP') == true and isZero(dice2) == true ? ref('wlp_current') : dice2}$${D1:=[1d:dice1:]}$${D2:=[1d:dice2:]}$

Attack Roll: ${D1+D2+ref('weapon1_mod')}$ ${! largerEq(D1, 6) and D1 == D2 ? string('CRITICAL SUCCESS! Gain an Opportunity'): string('')}$${!D1 == D2 and D1 == 1 ? string('FUMBLE'): string('')}$

The attack will deal ${ref('weapon1_damage')}$ ${!string(ref('weapon1_damagetype'))}$ damage!

contents.tooltip: Off-hand
Shift-click to roll attack with HR treated as zero (for two-weapon fighting)
contents.rollMessage:
Attacking with ${!string((off_hand))}$!

${#dice1:= equalText(string(off_attrib_1) ,'DEX') == true ? ref('dex_current') : 0}$ ${#dice1:= equalText(string(off_attrib_1) ,'INS') == true and isZero(dice1) == true ? ref('ins_current') : dice1}$ ${#dice1:= equalText(string(off_attrib_1) ,'MIG') == true and isZero(dice1) == true ? ref('mig_current') : dice1}$ ${#dice1:= equalText(string(off_attrib_1) ,'WLP') == true and isZero(dice1) == true ? ref('wlp_current') : dice1}$ ${#dice2:= equalText(string(off_attrib_2) ,'DEX') == true ? ref('dex_current') : 0}$ ${#dice2:= equalText(string(off_attrib_2) ,'INS') == true and isZero(dice2) == true ? ref('ins_current') : dice2}$ ${#dice2:= equalText(string(off_attrib_2) ,'MIG') == true and isZero(dice2) == true ? ref('mig_current') : dice2}$ ${#dice2:= equalText(string(off_attrib_2) ,'WLP') == true and isZero(dice2) == true ? ref('wlp_current') : dice2}$${D1:=[1d:dice1:]}$, ${D2:=[1d:dice2:]}$${#HR:=max(D1, D2)}$

Attack Roll: ${D1+D2+ref('off_mod_1')}$ ${! largerEq(D1, 6) and D1 == D2 ? string('CRITICAL SUCCESS! Gain an Opportunity'): string('')}$${!D1 == D2 and D1 == 1 ? string('FUMBLE'): string('')}$

The attack will deal ${HR+ (D1==0? 0: ref('off_mod_2'))}$ ${!string(ref('weapon2_damagetype'))}$ damage!
contents.altRollMessage:
Attacking with ${!string((off_hand))}$ using two-weapon fighting!

${#dice1:= equalText(string(off_attrib_1) ,'DEX') == true ? ref('dex_current') : 0}$ ${#dice1:= equalText(string(off_attrib_1) ,'INS') == true and isZero(dice1) == true ? ref('ins_current') : dice1}$ ${#dice1:= equalText(string(off_attrib_1) ,'MIG') == true and isZero(dice1) == true ? ref('mig_current') : dice1}$ ${#dice1:= equalText(string(off_attrib_1) ,'WLP') == true and isZero(dice1) == true ? ref('wlp_current') : dice1}$ ${#dice2:= equalText(string(off_attrib_2) ,'DEX') == true ? ref('dex_current') : 0}$ ${#dice2:= equalText(string(off_attrib_2) ,'INS') == true and isZero(dice2) == true ? ref('ins_current') : dice2}$ ${#dice2:= equalText(string(off_attrib_2) ,'MIG') == true and isZero(dice2) == true ? ref('mig_current') : dice2}$ ${#dice2:= equalText(string(off_attrib_2) ,'WLP') == true and isZero(dice2) == true ? ref('wlp_current') : dice2}$${D1:=[1d:dice1:]}$, ${D2:=[1d:dice2:]}$${#HR:=max(D1, D2)}$

Attack Roll: ${D1+D2+ref('off_mod_1')}$ ${! largerEq(D1, 6) and D1 == D2 ? string('CRITICAL SUCCESS! Gain an Opportunity'): string('')}$${!D1 == D2 and D1 == 1 ? string('FUMBLE'): string('')}$

The attack will deal ${(D1==0? 0: ref('off_mod_2'))}$ ${!string(ref('weapon2_damagetype'))}$ damage!

rowLayout.rollMessage:
${!sameRow('basic_name')}$

${!sameRow('details','')}$ ${#dice1:= equalText(string(sameRow('attrib_1')) ,'DEX') == true ? ref('dex_current') : 0}$ ${#dice1:= equalText(string(sameRow('attrib_1')) ,'INS') == true ? ref('ins_current') : dice1}$ ${#dice1:= equalText(string(sameRow('attrib_1')) ,'MIG') == true ? ref('mig_current') : dice1}$ ${#dice1:= equalText(string(sameRow('attrib_1')) ,'WLP') == true ? ref('wlp_current') : dice1}$ ${#dice2:= equalText(string(sameRow('attrib_2')) ,'DEX') == true ? ref('dex_current') : 0}$ ${#dice2:= equalText(string(sameRow('attrib_2')) ,'INS') == true ? ref('ins_current') : dice2}$ ${#dice2:= equalText(string(sameRow('attrib_2')) ,'MIG') == true ? ref('mig_current') : dice2}$ ${#dice2:= equalText(string(sameRow('attrib_2')) ,'WLP') == true ? ref('wlp_current') : dice2}$ ${#D1:=[1d:dice1:]}$ ${#D2:=[1d:dice2:]}$ ${!concat('

Check: ', string(D1), ' + ', string(D2), ' + ', string(sameRow('check_bonus')), ' = ', string(D1+D2+sameRow('check_bonus')), ' vs. DEF

')}$ ${!concat('

Damage: HR + ', string(sameRow('dmg_bonus')), ' = ', string(max(D1, D2)+sameRow('dmg_bonus')), ' ', string(sameRow('type')), '

')}$ ${!string(sameRow('detail'))}$

${!sameRow('spell_name')}$

${!sameRow('details','')}$ ${#dice1:= equalText(string(sameRow('attrib_1')) ,'DEX') == true ? ref('dex_current') : 0}$ ${#dice1:= equalText(string(sameRow('attrib_1')) ,'INS') == true ? ref('ins_current') : dice1}$ ${#dice1:= equalText(string(sameRow('attrib_1')) ,'MIG') == true ? ref('mig_current') : dice1}$ ${#dice1:= equalText(string(sameRow('attrib_1')) ,'WLP') == true ? ref('wlp_current') : dice1}$ ${#dice2:= equalText(string(sameRow('attrib_2')) ,'DEX') == true ? ref('dex_current') : 0}$ ${#dice2:= equalText(string(sameRow('attrib_2')) ,'INS') == true ? ref('ins_current') : dice2}$ ${#dice2:= equalText(string(sameRow('attrib_2')) ,'MIG') == true ? ref('mig_current') : dice2}$ ${#dice2:= equalText(string(sameRow('attrib_2')) ,'WLP') == true ? ref('wlp_current') : dice2}$ ${#D1:=[1d:dice1:]}$ ${#D2:=[1d:dice2:]}$ ${!equalText(string(sameRow('attrib_1')),'NO') ? '' : concat('

Check: ', string(D1), ' + ', string(D2), ' + ', string(sameRow('check_bonus')), ' = ', string(D1+D2+sameRow('check_bonus')), ' vs. MDEF

')}$ ${!equalText(string(sameRow('attrib_1')),'NO') or equalText(string(sameRow('has_damage')),'NO') ? '' : concat('

Damage: HR + ', string(sameRow('dmg_bonus')), ' = ', string(max(D1, D2)+sameRow('dmg_bonus')), ' ', string(sameRow('type')), '

')}$
